entertainment.name: 观远足道养生SPA (Spicy Panda - Jiefangbei Branch NO.5)
entertainment.location: Jiefangbei Square area (解放碑中心NO·5店), ~800m from Raffles City, Yuzhong District
entertainment.notes: One of Chongqing's largest spa chains with excellent reputation. Offers reflexology, massage, buffet, and relaxation cinema. Estimated cost 250-400 CNY (~$35-55 USD) for 90min session. Search '观远足道养生SPA(重庆解放碑中心NO·5店)' on Baidu/Gaode Maps. Book via Meituan/Dianping or walk-in. Late evening slots fill quickly.
entertainment.alternative: InterContinental Raffles City Hotel Spa (in-hotel, more expensive ~500-600 CNY but most convenient)

entertainment.name: 舞剧《只此青绿》- Poetic Dance: The Journey of a Legendary Landscape Painting
entertainment.location: 国家大剧院歌剧院 (National Centre for the Performing Arts - Opera House), 2 West Chang'an Avenue, Xicheng District
entertainment.notes: CRITICAL: NOT YET BOOKED - 2026 schedule not released as of Feb 2026. Monitor www.chncpa.org starting Jan 2026 for ticket release. 2025 performances were Jan 30-Feb 4, so Feb 22 may not have a show. Ticket prices: 180-980 RMB (recommend 580-780 RMB seats = ~80-110 EUR). Book via NCPA website, WeChat mini-program, Damai, or Maoyan. Real-name system: max 3 tickets per ID. BACKUP PLAN: If no show on Feb 22, consider: National Theatre performances, Capital Theatre, or Beijing Concert Hall events.
entertainment.booking: MUST BOOK ONCE 2026 SCHEDULE RELEASED - typically 1-2 months before show
entertainment.english_support: Performance in Chinese, minimal English subtitles
entertainment.logistics: Allow 45-60min from hotel to NCPA. Evening performance works with afternoon university registration schedule.

entertainment.name: Dance Studio Registration - Millennium Dance Complex Beijing
entertainment.location: 798 Art District, Chaoyang District, Beijing (check www.millennium-china.com/beijing for exact address)
entertainment.notes: RECOMMENDED: LA-founded studio's China branch. Offers Urban Dance, Hip Hop, Jazz, Contemporary, Waacking, House, etc. Classes taught in English or Chinese at all skill levels (beginner to masterclass). Very foreigner-friendly. Visit for registration + optional trial class. Estimated package costs: Single class ~500 RMB, 10-class package ~3,000 RMB, 20-class ~5,000 RMB (~70-425 EUR for packages). Bring passport for registration. ALTERNATIVE: Zaha Club (嘉禾舞社) - 8 Beijing locations, also offers English classes.
entertainment.booking: Check website schedule first, then visit for in-person registration
entertainment.preparation: Bring: passport, payment method (WeChat Pay/Alipay/cash), comfortable clothes if trying trial class

entertainment.name: Evening Activity Option: Liangma River Boat Ride
entertainment.notes: Beijing's most international waterfront night scene. Last boat at 22:20. Beautiful evening views close to Sanlitun nightlife area. Estimated cost 100 CNY (~$15 USD). Good for relaxed evening on weeknight.

entertainment.name: Evening Option: East Shore Live Jazz Cafe
entertainment.notes: No entrance fee, drink purchase required. Great atmosphere, friendly English-speaking staff. Expensive drinks but excellent live jazz. Popular with expats and locals. Tuesday evenings feature jazz jam sessions.
entertainment.booking: Walk-in, arrive early for good seats

entertainment.name: Evening Option: MO Bar at Mandarin Oriental
entertainment.notes: Stunning Forbidden City views. Sophisticated cocktails, cosmopolitan crowd. Perfect for sunset drinks and evening relaxation. Upscale atmosphere. Estimated 2-3 cocktails at 150-200 CNY each (~$40 USD total).
entertainment.booking: Walk-in acceptable, reservations recommended for window seats

entertainment.name: Evening Option: Jianghu Bar (Live Music)
entertainment.notes: Cozy hutong venue. Live music every night, Tuesday jazz jam sessions. International clientele, friendly staff. Recommended by travelers. Good for casual Thursday evening. Estimated cost for drinks.

entertainment.name: Indoor Couple Photography Session - Wave Soda Studio (RECOMMENDED)
entertainment.location: Jingyuan Art Centre, Beijing (search 'WAVESODA摄影工作室' or '海波摄影工作室' on Xiaohongshu/Dianping)
entertainment.notes: PREMIUM OPTION: RMB2,388 (~340 EUR) includes 2 costume sets, 2 themed indoor studio sets, 12 professionally retouched high-res photos, 3-hour session. K-pop/trendy themes available (BLACKPINK Jennie style, etc). Perfect for INFJ personality (curated/artistic). Photos delivered digitally in 5-7 days. MUST BOOK 2-4 WEEKS IN ADVANCE via Xiaohongshu, Dianping, or Meituan. BUDGET ALTERNATIVE: Himo Studio (海马体照相馆) - 499 RMB (~70 EUR) couple package, 600+ China locations, less artistic but professional.
entertainment.booking: ADVANCE BOOKING REQUIRED (2-4 weeks) - use Xiaohongshu/Dianping/Meituan apps
entertainment.english_support: Medium - booking apps in Chinese, but studio staff can handle basic English
entertainment.scheduling: Friday preferred (avoid Tue/Wed/Thu per user constraint)

entertainment.name: Alternative: Indoor Couple Photography (if not done Day 14)
entertainment.notes: Backup date for photography session if Day 14 was used for other activities.

entertainment.name: Evening Option: CJ Lounge
entertainment.location: 14th Floor, next to Workers' Stadium, Beijing
entertainment.notes: Panoramic skyline views. Cozy luxury space, velvet seating, moody lighting. Hours 6pm-2am. Quality cocktails. Good for Tuesday evening relaxation. Near newly rebuilt stadium.

entertainment.name: Evening Option: Blue Note Beijing
entertainment.notes: First Chinese branch of famous NYC jazz club. Grammy-winning musicians have performed here (Chick Corea, Kamasi Washington). Premium jazz experience. Higher ticket prices for shows (~300-500 CNY), drinks additional. Check schedule for specific Wednesday performances.
entertainment.booking: Advance booking recommended for popular shows

entertainment.name: Evening Option: Yun Summer Lounge at Peninsula Hotel
entertainment.notes: Elegant modern lounge with stunning Forbidden City and skyline views. Crafted cocktails, premium champagnes, modern sharing plates. Perfect for Thursday evening sunset drinks. Premium pricing but exceptional views and service.

cozy_cafes_beijing.name: 喜鹊咖啡馆 (Magpie Cafe)
cozy_cafes_beijing.location: 76 Guozijian Street, Dongcheng District (near Lama Temple)
cozy_cafes_beijing.notes: Scandinavian design, authentic Swedish desserts, wooden furniture. Rating 4.1. Perfect for INFJ personality - small and niche. Subway Line 5, Exit E.

cozy_cafes_beijing.name: Alley Cafe
cozy_cafes_beijing.notes: Excellent 4.8 rating. Quiet hutong location. Perfect for reading and relaxing.

cozy_cafes_beijing.name: Voyage Coffee
cozy_cafes_beijing.notes: 4.6 rating. Located in famous 798 Art Zone. Great for combining art browsing with coffee.

cozy_cafes_beijing.name: Berrybeans
cozy_cafes_beijing.notes: 4.4 rating. Traditional hutong location with modern cafe vibes.

cozy_cafes_beijing.name: Cote Cafe
cozy_cafes_beijing.notes: Excellent 4.7 rating. High-quality coffee in charming hutong setting.

cute_toy_stores_beijing.name: POP MART (Sanlitun)
cute_toy_stores_beijing.notes: Rating 4.4. Premium Popmart location in trendy Sanlitun. Collectible art toys, blind boxes, limited editions. Perfect for INFJ interest in cute/trendy items.

cute_toy_stores_beijing.name: POP MART Art Toy Heibiao Concept Store
cute_toy_stores_beijing.notes: Rating 5.0. Largest concept store with exclusive releases. Must-visit for Popmart fans.

cute_toy_stores_beijing.name: POP MART (Wangfujing APM)
cute_toy_stores_beijing.notes: Central location near shopping area. Convenient for combining with other activities.

cute_toy_stores_beijing.name: POPLAND
cute_toy_stores_beijing.notes: Rating 4.3. Larger experiential space beyond just shopping.

english_bookstores_beijing.name: Foreign Languages Bookstore
english_bookstores_beijing.notes: Rating 3.8. Beijing's most iconic destination for English books. Extensive foreign-language collection. Perfect for INFJ interest in independent reading.

english_bookstores_beijing.name: PAGEONE Wangfujing
english_bookstores_beijing.notes: Foreigner-friendly. Wide range of English books. Significantly expanded selection in recent years. Multiple locations in Beijing.

english_bookstores_beijing.name: Jetlag Books
english_bookstores_beijing.notes: Intimate spot mixing independent publishing, second-hand books, pop-up art exhibitions. Perfect for creative INFJ travelers. Small and niche.

english_bookstores_beijing.name: Kubrick Bookstore
english_bookstores_beijing.notes: Fantastic selection of film and art titles. Small screening room for director talks. Strong in traditional Chinese character books.
